name: wepback-vsts-extension
description: webpack Visual Studio Team System (VSTS) Extension

scripts.setup: npm install && typings install && cd tasks/webpack-build-task && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run setup && tsc && node node_modules/tfx-cli/_build/tfx-cli.js extension create --manifest-glob vss-extension.json --output-path ./dist

author: Dealogic
